title: Feature ID Texture in EXT_feature_metadata
description: An object describing a texture used for storing per-texel feature IDs.

featureTable.description: The ID of the feature table in the model's root `EXT_feature_metadata.featureTables` dictionary.

featureIds.description: A description of the texture and channel to use for feature IDs. The `channels` property must have a single channel. Furthermore, feature IDs must be whole numbers in the range `[0, count - 1]` (inclusive), where `count` is the total number of features in the feature table. Texel values must be read as integers. Texture filtering should be disabled when fetching feature IDs.
